mapper.insert: INSERT INTO permission( app_id, parent_id, icon, name, url, sort, is_menu, is_enable ) VALUES ( #{appId}, #{parentId}, #{icon}, #{name}, #{url}, #{sort}, #{isMenu}, #{isEnable} )
mapper.update: UPDATE permission a SET a.`app_id` = #{appId}, a.`parent_id` = #{parentId}, a.`icon` = #{icon}, a.`name` = #{name}, a.`url` = #{url}, a.`sort` = #{sort}, a.`is_menu` = #{isMenu}, a.is_enable = #{isEnable} WHERE a.`id` = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT p.id, p.parent_id, p.name, p.url, p.icon, p.is_menu, p.sort FROM permission p
INNER JOIN role_permission rp ON p.id = rp.permission_id INNER JOIN role r ON r.id = rp.role_id AND r.is_enable = 1 INNER JOIN user_role ur ON ur.role_id = r.id
WHERE 1 = 1 AND p.is_enable = 1
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM app a WHERE a.id = p.app_id AND a.is_enable = 1 AND a.code = #{appCode})
AND ur.user_id = #{userId}
ORDER BY p.parent_id ASC, p.sort DESC
